meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nathan Tsoi Rebecca Speas Elliot Yates Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6978.

td.p: Nathan Tsoi, a program analyst from Arlington, Virginia
Rebecca Speas, a theater artist originally from Greensboro, North Carolina
Elliot Yates, an opera producer from New York, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $50,000)

tr.td: THE $1 BILL
TV ADJECTIVES
SPANISH CLASS
THE NOVEL'S TITLE CHARACTER
"15" YEARS
OF THE NATIONAL DESIGN AWARDS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jimmy of the Clue Crew shows currency on the monitor.) At the top of each bill are the words "this note is..." this two-word phrase "...for all debts public and private"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

the \"Iron Lady\"')
